name: Bryze
description:
Guide your character from humble beginnings to grand adventure as you set out to explore the massive open world of Bryze!

Throughout your journey, you will sail the seas in search of islands, fortresses, towns, and dungeons full of fearsome enemies and mighty bosses.

To overcome the challenging enemies and bosses that you will face, you will need to purchase items from shops, find  equipment and complete quests.
